name: Space City Wars Deluxe
description:
Space city wars is an amazing arcade shooter set in the galaxy.
The enemies from another universe have come to conquer the last human city.
Configure your spaceship with weapons and modules and fight between buildings, asteroids and stars to save humanity. The bosses are challenging, testing your reflexes, skills and strategy.

MAIN FEATURES

- Incredible space war simulator with a AI that take you to the limit.
- Endless runner mode.
- Cutting edge 3D graphic.
- Smooth and simple spaceship control system.
- Easy to learn hard to master.
- Epic sound tracks.
- Exciting VFX effect.
- Nice optimized with graphics configuration.
- World Leaderboard.
- 2 new cams
- 2 new wepons
- 3 new ships
- 3 new modules
- 3 lives for game
